twin.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: one of two children born at the same time to the same mother
twin.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The twins are now eight months old.
twin.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: used to describe one of two children who are twins
twin.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: used to describe two things that happen at the same time and are related to each other
twin.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: the twin problems of poverty and unemployment
twin.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: to form a relationship between two similar towns in different countries in order to encourage visits between them
twin.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: Chichester in England is twinned with Chartres in France.
twin.translation[2].definitions[1].defin: to form a relationship between two places, people, or ideas
twin.translation[2].definitions[1].examp: Dole has been twinned in the history books with his old rival Bush.
